# Stardew Valley Mods

Repository for all my Stardew Valley mods.

- [CP] Placeable Wood Barrels
- [Custom Winter Star Gifts](https://github.com/chippokiddo/sdvmods/wiki/Custom-Winter-Star-Gifts)
